channel.title: Can som1 elp me on how to change the portal colors?
channel.description:
can anyone tell me how to change the color of the portals? im using satan's isle as a source
ps: is there any way to change where the portals take you?

item.title: Can som1 elp me on how to change the portal colors?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Yes, the portals have id’s and the id’s are cases so you can search for the portal id’s in client.java and change the teleport stuff there. You can change the color of portals but that means you need to delete the current portal and add another one since there is many portals with different id’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Can som1 elp me on how to change the portal colors?
